data.name: CreateNextTranInfo
ReadNextTranInfo
data.value: select top(1) T1.LAST_TRAN, T1.LEGAL_ACTION_IDENT, T1.COURT_CASE_NUMBER, T1.CASE_NUMBER, T1.CSE_PERSON_NUMBER, T1.CSE_PERSON_NUMBER0, T1.CSE_PERSON_NUMBER1, T1.CSE_PERSON_NUMBER2, T1.COURT_ORDER_NUMBER, T1.OBLIGATION_ID, T1.STD_CRT_ORD_NBR, T1.PLAN_TASK_ID, T1.MISC_TEXT_1, T1.MISC_TEXT_2, T1.MISC_NUM_1, T1.MISC_NUM_2, T1.MISC_NUM_1_V2, T1.MISC_NUM_2_V2, T1.OSP_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T2 join CKT_NEXT_TRAN_INFO T1 on (T2.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.OSP_ID) and (T2.USER_ID = @userId)

data.name: ReadServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where USER_ID = @userId

data.name: ReadTransaction
data.value: select top(1) SCREEN_ID, TRANCODE, NEXT_TRAN_AUTH from CKT_TRANSACTION where SCREEN_ID = @screenId

data.name: UpdateNextTranInfo
data.value: update CKT_NEXT_TRAN_INFO set LAST_TRAN = @lastTran, LEGAL_ACTION_IDENT = @legalActionIdent, COURT_CASE_NUMBER = @courtCaseNumber, CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber, CSE_PERSON_NUMBER = @csePersonNumber, CSE_PERSON_NUMBER0 = @csePersonNumber0, CSE_PERSON_NUMBER1 = @csePersonNumber1, CSE_PERSON_NUMBER2 = @csePersonNumber2, COURT_ORDER_NUMBER = @courtOrderNumber, OBLIGATION_ID = @obligationId, STD_CRT_ORD_NBR = @stdCrtOrdNbr, PLAN_TASK_ID = @planTaskId, MISC_TEXT_1 = @miscText1, MISC_TEXT_2 = @miscText2, MISC_NUM_1 = @miscNum1, MISC_NUM_2 = @miscNum2, MISC_NUM_1_V2 = @miscNum1V2, MISC_NUM_2_V2 = @miscNum2V2 where OSP_ID = @ospId
